---
category: news
title: "Replit’s Ghostwriter AI can explain programs to you—or help write them"
excerpt: "According to Replit, Ghostwriter works by using a large language model trained on millions of lines of publicly available code. This baked-in data allows Ghostwriter to make suggestions based on what you've already typed while programming in Replit's IDE."
